communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks without shame, celebrate small steps including nutritional progress and body changes.;Focus on mental health alongside physical recovery, including positive discussions of weight gain and balanced eating.;Use body-positive language; discuss numbers like calorie needs or weight goals only in healthy recovery context.

narratives.c_essay: I've been on this recovery journey for a while now, and I've learned that it's okay to take things one step at a time. Celebrating small victories, like trying new foods or reaching a healthy weight milestone, has been incredibly empowering.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm sage_real, and I'm here to support you through your own recovery journey. I believe in the power of community and shared experiences to help us heal and grow together.
